attributes.action: Simply legalise the sale and distribution of marijuana.
attributes.additional_details:
Simply because it would benefit Britain immensely.
Not only is hemp used to treat ailments such as anxiety and depression which is only rising especially in young men. It can be turned into paper, is an easily tradable resource which could replace tobacco and alcohol altogether in my opinion. We could easily corner the market, Britain has some of the best soil on the earth. If I had more space in these boxes to write more i would, in short, legalise marijuana for people of age (dispute this)
attributes.background: Legalising marijuana will not only pull us out of an abysmal recession from which we are steadily slipping down due to brexit and trade laws. Our climate is perfect condition to grow certain strains and turn these uneducated drug dealers into lucrative farmers.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Legalize cannabis for recreational and medical use
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575625
